subject: Order #SSN5817
description_text:
Good Afternoon,

I am contacting you to try and get an order invoice for order #SNN5817 for
the purpose of third party reimbursement. This third party requires a
payment date, to include year, on the invoice. The orders section on your
website unfortunately doesn't include this information. If I could get an
invoice drafted that includes the year, I would greatly appreciate it.

Thank you,
Justin Finn

706-513-6703
justinf0819@gmail.com
453 Charleston Pl, Villa Rica, GA 30180

conversations.body_text: Hi Justin Finn,    I apologize for not getting back to you sooner. Here is your invoice.
